title: The Movie DataBase
desc: This is a movie database designed and developed using reactJS in its core. This App uses TMDB API to fetch and display the data.

title: Music Player
desc: A music player which is also a music library. It fetches the songs from GDrive using some cool GS tricks. Its my first ever project where I interacted with a server/DataBase.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
desc: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe tac toe game, where opponent bot plays like a 2-years old

title: 15 Puzzle
desc: A simple puzzle game, I developed to kill my boredom.

title: Profile Card
desc: A profile card design to showcase your identity and all social handles at a single place, with a built-in contact form,through which anyone can communicate with you

title: ChatNow
desc: A chat application(web) , created using NodeJS and Socket.io. This is a realtime messaging System, which uses text files to store and process chats. All the chat-data is encrypted using cryptoJS.

title: LiveStreaming via BlockChain
desc: A LiveStreaming Platform built by using LivePeer API. This App allows users to start LiveStream and Share Camera and Screen with the World. This App communicates with Solidity SmartContract Deployed on Ethereum BlockChain using Web3JS.

title: VoiceChat webApp
desc: WebApp which provide realtime VoiceChat capability to users, along with other features like Texting, custom rooms, etc.

title: ML Algirithms Blog + Quizzes
desc: A webPage to showcase some basic and most used Machine Learning Algorithms. This website also provides practice problems for mentioned algoriths. Solution Submitted can be examined by the teachers through admin page.

title: SOS - Emergency Alert Signal
desc: A website which can be very useful in Emergency Situations. It can be used to send Live-Location, Emergency messages, SOS signals, etc directly to other Users of the website via Email, Telegram Group and Browser notification. In any case of distress, This website can be used to rescue others.

title: Terminal Chat
desc: This is a Node Module, supposed to be installed globally. It provides Chatting capabilities in the CLI itself. It can be used to Create and join Chatrooms from Terminal Itsekf without installing any other proprietery softwares.
